alert.note: Alert for Northern Grafton (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 4:25PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Grafton County through 500 PM EDT... At 425 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ryegate, or 13 miles west of Littleton, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Littleton, Lisbon, Bath, Monroe, Lyman, Landaff and Sugar Hill. This includes Interstate 93 between mile markers 129 and 130. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
